gw.api.product

Class ProducerCodeQueryRestrictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.product.ProducerCodeQueryRestrictor

  • public class ProducerCodeQueryRestrictor
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that can restrict Queries on ProducerCode in various ways. This class is written in Java so it may be leveraged by both Java and Gosu based Queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ProducerCodeQueryRestrictor()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProducerCodeQueryRestrictor

    • Method Detail

      • restrictProducerCodeQueryByUser

        public static void restrictProducerCodeQueryByUser(ISelectQueryBuilder<ProducerCode> query,
                                                   User user)
        Restricts the given ISelectQueryBuilder on ProducerCode by the given gw.pl.community.entity.User. This fundamentally comes down to adding an OR clause to the query to check either of the following conditions:
        • The given user has the correct ProducerCode (as joined through the UserProducerCode table)
        • The given user is in a group with the correct ProducerCode (as joined through the GroupUser table)
        Parameters:
        query - the ISelectQueryBuilder to restrict by User
        user - the user to restrict the Query by

      • restrictProducerCodeQueryByStatusUses

        public static void restrictProducerCodeQueryByStatusUses(ISelectQueryBuilder<ProducerCode> query,
                                                         ProducerStatusUse categoryToCheck)
        Restricts the given ISelectQueryBuilder on ProducerCode by ProducerStatusUse. This is done by checking the ProducerCode.ProducerStatus to the set of ProducersStatuses with the given ProducerStatusUse category.
        Parameters:
        query - the Query on ProducerCode to restrict by ProducerStatusUse
        categoryToCheck - the ProducerStatusUse to restrict by
